netboard
Class DrawingPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  netboard.DrawingPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DrawingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A derivative of javax.swing.JPanel implementing drawing board capabilities

Author:
Marcin 'golish' Goliszewski, Slawomir 'schylek' Chylek
See Also:
Serialized Form
